about_the_game: Unlock all items in the Video, Music, and Album galleries in the CPU Hotel! Cut to the chase and get a sneak peek at all the neat unlockable goodies!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32bit, 64bit)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (64bit) or later
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series

short_description: Unlock all the CPU Hotel gallery items!
